jd: From: Shakthi Satkuri, Flexon Technologies shakthi@flexontechnologies.com Reply to: shakthi@flexontechnologies.com Project Manager having OTC experience with at least 1 S/4 HANA Austin, TX & Cupertino, CA TCS/Apple Project Manager having OTC experience with at least 1 S/4 HANA migration/Implementation experience.? Ability to work with PMO, techical, and functional teams to gather requirements on project timeline, put project build plan for systems, and deliver the environments in support of project timeline.? Provided technical management oversight to support the project planning and execution for infrastructure and build activities, delivery of environments for development phase, integration, user acceptance, and performance test phases, and dress rehearsal, to cutover? Clear understanding of project life cycle of System Conversion projects and dual landscape management from Development, Integration Test, User Acceptance Test, Dress Rehearsal, and Cutover.
